mapper.select: select c.*, b.book_title, b.book_price_for_sale, b.book_img, c.cart_cnt*b.book_price_for_sale as total from cart c inner join book b on c.isbn = b.isbn where c.user_id = #{user_id}
select c.*, b.book_title, b.book_price_for_sale, b.book_img, c.cart_cnt*b.book_price_for_sale as total from cart c inner join book b on c.isbn = b.isbn where cart_no=#{cart_no}
insert into cart(cart_no, user_id, isbn, cart_cnt) values(CART_SEQ.nextval, #{user_id}, #{isbn}, #{cart_cnt})

select t1.coupon_no, t1.coupon_name, t1.coupon_req, t1.coupon_use_req, t1.coupon_discount_percent, t1.coupon_validate from (select c1.user_id, c2.* from coupon_no c1 inner join coupon c2 on c1.coupon_no = c2.coupon_no where c1.user_id=#{user_id} and c2.coupon_use_req<=#{coupon_use_req} and c1.coupon_available='t' and c2.coupon_validate>=TO_DATE(sysdate)) t1 inner join (select user_id, user_level from user_info where user_id=#{user_id}) t2 on t1.user_id = t2.user_id where t1.coupon_req<=t2.user_level order by t1.coupon_no
mapper.insert: insert into orders(orders_no, user_id, orders_payment, orders_total, refund_account, refund_bank, orders_date, orders_pay_date, coupon_no, post_no, orders_pay_total, delivery_fee, discounted_point) values(ORDERS_SEQ.nextval, #{user_id}, #{orders_payment}, #{orders_total}, #{refund_account}, #{refund_bank}, SYSDATE, ${orders_pay_date}, #{coupon_no}, #{post_no}, #{orders_pay_total}, #{delivery_fee}, #{discounted_point})
mapper.update: update coupon_no set coupon_available='f' where coupon_no=#{useCoupon} and user_id=#{user_id}
update user_info set user_point=#{point} where user_id=#{user_id}
update user_info set user_tot_price = user_tot_price + #{orders_pay_total} where user_id=#{user_id}
